alerts.description: RT_Sends email to RT Event creater when Broadcast Audio Gold or Platinum Event is booked.

RT_Level 3 Operator Feedback Notification to L3 Management
RT_New RT Event Set to "Closed" Status
RT_Notify Events Team if an event with closed captioning is cancelled

RT_Sends email to InterCall management when an event is completed

fieldUpdates.description: When Collect Participant Information is marked as "True", update the Participant Report field to Yes.
fieldUpdates.name: RT_Collect Participant Information True

fieldUpdates.formula: "IMPORTANT REMINDER: You have selected a Custom Operator-read introduction. Please reply-all to this email to provide the script for this custom introduction. We ask that you please provide this to us at least 24 hours in advance. This ensures we have time to upload it to your reservation, and the Operator has time to prepare for it."
fieldUpdates.name: RT_Custom Script Text Field Update

fieldUpdates.description: “L3 Toll Free Number” field to the “Conference Phone Number” field in the CVS-Specific Fields
fieldUpdates.name: RT_L3 Toll Free # to Conference Phone #

fieldUpdates.description: If Custom Scripted Rec'd = TBD, then Reservation Comments field gets automatically filled in.
fieldUpdates.formula: "IMPORTANT: Please send your customized script to events@readytalk.com at least 24hrs in advance. This ensures we have time to upload it and the operator has time to prepare for it."
fieldUpdates.name: RT_Reservation Comments Field Update

rules.fullName: RT_300 Port Pre-Call Notification - Events Team
rules.description: If a 300 port call is booked, send notification to the Account Owner and Events Team for awareness and proper staffing.

rules.fullName: RT_Add Broadcast Audio on RT Event
rules.description: Selects broadcast audio for webinar 150, 500 & 3000 subs

rules.fullName: RT_Automated Audio Type%2C Set 15 Minute Pre-Conference Duration
rules.description: Sets the pre-conference duration to 15 minutes if the audio type is set to automated
Sends email to event manager confirming that Broadcast Audio event was set up correctly under a "do not bill" Account in Salesforce.com.
Notifies the events team to cancel with Caption Colorado if an event with closed captioning is canceled
Updates the Participant List Picklist field to a Yes or No based on the value of the Participant List checkbox field.
Updates the Participant List Picklist field to a Yes or No based on the value of the Participant List checkbox field.
Notifies the creator/editor that an event has been created or edited with a event date in the past
This workflow sends an email to the Account Manager when a Meeting Organizer's first RT Event is completed.
This workflow sends an email to the Events Owner to confirm Meeting Organizers First Time event.
This workflow sends an email to the Account Executive and Account Owner when a Meeting Organizer's first RT Event is booked.

rules.fullName: RT_First Time Event%2FAE listed as AO - Jordan Hilgers
rules.description: This workflow sends an email to the AE if they schedule themselves as the Account Owner on a first time event (need to provide background to EM)
An automated email sent to the meeting organizer when it is the first time they book a Simulve Event with ReadyTalk
Sets GX Recording field to "No" if no value is selected.

rules.fullName: RT_InterCall Outsourced RT Event Conclusion Feedback Notification
rules.description: Sends email to InterCall contacts regarding Operator Performance

rules.fullName: RT_L3 Addl Live Event Support Fee - No
rules.description: Updates the Addl Live Event Support Fee when service and hours are selected.

rules.fullName: RT_L3 Addl Live Event Support Fee - Yes
rules.description: Updates the Addl Live Event Support Fee when service and hours are selected.
Updates the Dry Run Hours and Fee fields when Dry Run equals "Yes".
Updates the Dry Run Hours and Fee fields when Dry Run equals "Yes".
Updates event base rate field when event type is selected.
Updates event base rate field when event type is selected.
Updates the Event Reporting Hours and Fee fields when Event Reporting equals "Yes".
Updates the Event Reporting Hours and Fee fields when Event Reporting equals "Yes".
Updates the Slide Management Fee when service and hours are selected.
Updates the Slide Management Fee when service and hours are selected.

rules.fullName: RT_Level 3 Outsourced RT Event Conclusion Feedback Notification
rules.description: Sends email to Level 3 contacts regarding Operator Performance

rules.fullName: RT_Map %22L3 Toll Free Number%E2%80%9D field to the %E2%80%9CConference Phone Number%E2%80%9D field in the CVS-Specific Fields
rules.description: On save, the “L3 Toll Free Number” field will auto populate to the “Conference Phone Number” field in the CVS-Specific Fields
Updates Meeting Organizer phone and email when name is filled in.

rules.fullName: RT_New RT Event Set to %22Closed%22 Status
rules.description: Sends email to event creator to ensure event wasn't set to closed in error.
A workflow that updates the "New Reservation or Current?" Field on RT Event - Broadcast Video records when the "Reservation # / Conference ID" field is filled in
Sends an email to the ReadyTalk Events team when an online reservation is missing a reservation number after 24 hours.

rules.fullName: RT_PGI RT Event Conclusion Feedback Notification
rules.description: Sends email to PGI contacts regarding Operator Performance
Sets participant mode to default of Listen Only when an event is created.
This workflow sends an email to the events team when an event has been booked and GX has not sent a confirmation.

rules.description: Sends an email to the meeting organizer if marked as first use.

rules.fullName: RT_Remove Assigned Event Manager on Cancelled Events
rules.description: If an event is cancelled, this workflow will remove the assigned event manager

rules.fullName: RT_Reservation Comments Auto Update Based on Custom Script Rec%27d Field Value
